pageContext.claim: “You have to see the activity on new plants being built for washing machines and for solar panels. We had 32 solar-panel plants. Of the 32, 30 were closed, and two were on life-to-life resuscitation. They were dead. Now they're talking about opening up many of them -- reopening plants that have been closed for a long time.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump consistently gets this wrong, saying that the two solar-panel companies that brought a complaint are the only ones remaining in the United States.
